Author: Calem | [x0z] | zero-zed.com#5181
Content: I plan on creating an asset chain on KMD as well. x0z is essentialy just Bitcoin ABC but rebooted from genisis and uses a completely different inflation algo. I've also thrown in an 8% premine which will become heavily diluted in the second year. This is for 2 reasons. funding the project for the 5 year inflation cycle, and so we hold enough supply to prevent any.. issue's..

Author: Calem | [x0z] | zero-zed.com#5181
Content: by the time we get 2.5 years in, most of the premine will be dispersed by hiring devs and for faucets and all that oldschool stuff we use to love

Author: Calem | [x0z] | zero-zed.com#5181
Content:
tldr

`What is needed is an alternative to Tether that is built on it‚Äôs own Proof-of-work backbone in order to break away from the ties to the US Dollars out of control inflation. Using the Diffusion of Innovations to base an inflation model, along with an industry supported tried and true mining algorithm and cross-chain transactions such as the Atomic Swap network on the Komodo (KMD) platform, a potential now exists to solve a long time debated issue surrounding not just volatility but how to achieve successful diffusion whilst maintaining the normal distribution and a standard score of 0z. In other words how do we create a stable crypto-currency that is, relatively speaking, evenly dispersed between everyone alive once new coins cease production.`
